sentences.english: Application of Homomorphic technology in infrared imagines processing.
sentences.chinese: 同態技術在紅外圖像處理中的應用。

sentences.english: The image processing apparatus performs color conversion processing on an input image.
sentences.chinese: 該圖像處理裝置對輸入圖像執行顏色變換處理。

sentences.english: Corner detection is the main task of the image processing in camera calibration.
sentences.chinese: 特徵角點的提取是攝像機定標中圖像處理的主要任務。

sentences.english: I developed image processing software for a camera manufacturer.
sentences.chinese: 我爲一家照相機生產商開發圖像處理軟件。

sentences.english: A kind of system avoiding automobile rear-end collision is introduced in detail based on the image processing recognition.
sentences.chinese: 詳細介紹了一種基於汽車防追尾的圖像處理識別系統。

sentences.english: Edge detection is a basic problem in digital image proces sing and computer vision.
sentences.chinese: 邊緣檢測是圖像處理和計算機視覺中的基本問題。

sentences.english: System test of the bottle test online image processing applications.
sentences.chinese: 系統測試了酒瓶檢測線上的圖像處理應用。

sentences.english: The measurement of leaf area based on image processing was introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了基於圖像處理技術的葉面積檢測法。

sentences.english: Do the image processing can bbe used for reference.
sentences.chinese: 做圖像處理的人可以用來參考。

sentences.english: Image processing was used to realize automatic collimation of missile.
sentences.chinese: 利用圖像處理軟件實現瞄準的自動化。

sentences.english: This ap- plication and the arithmetic provide new motheds for image processing.
sentences.chinese: 這對圖像處理的各方向的研究提供了新的工具。

sentences.english: An image processing system computes the size of the reticle image and the focal length.
sentences.chinese: 圖像處理系統將計算十字線的像的尺寸和焦距。

sentences.english: With image processing technique, the defect segmentation and characterizing are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探討了應用圖像處理技術對織物疵點進行分割表徵。

sentences.english: Therefore, application of the floatation froth image processing was studied.
sentences.chinese: 爲此，進行了浮選泡沫圖像處理應用的研究。

sentences.english: The applications of reaction-diffusion system in image processing are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了反應擴散系統在圖像處理領域中的應用。

sentences.english: And the system is implemented based on the DSP and FPGA co-processing.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了處理系統的硬件組成和圖像處理方法。

definition: abbr. of 資訊工程|资讯工程[zi1 xun4 gong1 cheng2]
